casebody.data:
JOHN CHURCH CO. v. FLEMING. (Circuit Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit. March 10, 1914.) No. 2573. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District, of Georgia; Emory Speer, Judge. David M. Levy, of Cincinnati, Ohio, and A. H. Heyward, Jr., of Macon, Ga., for appellant. Wm. H. Fleming, of Augusta, Ga., for appellee.

Before PARDEE, Circuit Judge, and NEWMAN and GRUBB, District Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decree appealed from, dissolving the restraining order and denying an injunction pendente lite, is affirmed, with costs.
